data.eml:eml: New paedomorphic brachiopods from the abyssal zone of the north-eastern Pacific Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bitner, Maria Aleksandra, Melnik, Vjacheslav P., Zezina, Olga N. (2013): New paedomorphic brachiopods from the abyssal zone of the north-eastern Pacific Ocean. Zootaxa 3613 (3): 281-288, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3613.3.6
